name: Paul Truitt
bio: I'm a Software Engineer and Full-Stack Developer driven to create positive change through technology. As a former theatre actor, lifelong artistic collaborator, and outdoor enthusiast, I bring a unique perspective to any development team. I find great satisfaction in solving problems and I approach each challenge with a blend of creativity, technical accumen, and a spirit of adventure. With a commitment to excellence honed through years of performance and production experience, and a love for the natural world that fuels my imagination and fuels my creativity, I am dedicated to crafting innovative solutions that empower people to connect, create, and thrive. I look forward to leveling up with your team.
